title: HUGE 2000sqft Penthouse Atop a 1920's ICONIC Gold Coast Gem
posting_body: Very sunny 19th floor 2,000 sqft 2-story 2  bedroom 1 1/2 bath PENTHOUSE APARTMENT in a classic 1920's high rise with spectacular city views.

The first floor features a large 42' X 17'  open floor plan with an original red brick floor and a 25' vaulted ceiling, two 10' X 10' thermo-pane windows with one facing north and the other west plus a 10' 5" X 5' balcony.
The 2nd floor consists of 2 bedrooms and a bathroom.
Located at State and Elm, designed by B. Leo Steif in the HEART of the Gold Coast just steps to Michigan Avenue, shopping, restaurants, entertainment and Oak Street Beach.
Take yourself on a virtual 360 tour here: https://kuula.co/share/collection/7vghG?logo=0&info=0&fs=1&vr=1&sd=1&initload=0&thumbs=1
Penthouse Features:
* First floor has a guest bathroom and large closet
* Kitchen has stainless steel appliances and granite countertops!
* Private Balcony with breathtaking city and lake views
In-unit washer and dryer
* 5 closets
Building Features:
* We pride ourselves on 24 hour or sooner turn around on maintenance requests
The building offers package delivery to your unit daily
* Smoke-free and pet-free building
* Intercom entry
* Evening door staff
* Heat, water, and refuse included in your rent.
We do not charge an additional monthly fee.
Neighborhood Features:
Perfect neighborhood to walk around in.
We are located in the heart of the Gold Coast at Rush & Elm.
Nearby is La Colombe Coffee, Starbucks, Jewel grocery store, CVS, Walgreens, Urban Outfitters, Somerset, Gibsons, Tavern on Rush, the Red Line, and many restaurants and shopping.
We are also one block from Oak street beach and the lakefront bike and running path.
We are family owned and managed and we care about our tenants and their apartment homes.
We are Central City Management and started in business in 1968.
Please go to Yelp and Google to see what current and former tenants say about us.
